soot.jimple.interproc.propagation.field.transformers

Class FieldTransformerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • soot.jimple.interproc.propagation.field.transformers.FieldTransformerManager

  • public class FieldTransformerManager
extends Object
    A manager singleton for field transformers, which is the entry point for generating field transformers.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FieldTransformer makeFieldTransformer(String action, Object value)
      Generates a field transformer for a given field operation and a given argument value.
      FieldTransformer makeFieldTransformer(String action, soot.Value symbol, soot.jimple.Stmt stmt, String op)
      Generates a field transformer for a given field operation, COAL symbol, COAL sink and a composed operation.
      void registerDefaultFieldTransformerFactories()
      Registers the field transformer factories for the field operations that are supported by COAL by default.
      void registerFieldTransformerFactory(String action, FieldTransformerFactory fieldTransformerFactory)
      Registers a field transformer factory for a given operation.
      static FieldTransformerManager v()
      Returns the singleton instance for the class.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • v

        public static FieldTransformerManager v()
        Returns the singleton instance for the class.
        Returns:
        The singleton instance for this class.

      • registerFieldTransformerFactory

        public void registerFieldTransformerFactory(String action,
                                   FieldTransformerFactory fieldTransformerFactory)
        Registers a field transformer factory for a given operation.
        Parameters:
        action - An operation that can be performed on fields.
        fieldTransformerFactory - A field transformer factory for the operation.

      • registerDefaultFieldTransformerFactories

        public void registerDefaultFieldTransformerFactories()
        Registers the field transformer factories for the field operations that are supported by COAL by default. Operations that are supported by default are add, remove, clear, replace and value composition.

      • makeFieldTransformer

        public FieldTransformer makeFieldTransformer(String action,
                                    Object value)
        Generates a field transformer for a given field operation and a given argument value.
        Parameters:
        action - A field operation. This should be one of the field operations registered with registerFieldTransformerFactory(String, FieldTransformerFactory).
        value - An argument value.
        Returns:
        A field transformer for the operation and argument.

      • makeFieldTransformer

        public FieldTransformer makeFieldTransformer(String action,
                                    soot.Value symbol,
                                    soot.jimple.Stmt stmt,
                                    String op)
        Generates a field transformer for a given field operation, COAL symbol, COAL sink and a composed operation. This is to be used for COAL value composition in non-iterative analyses only.
        Parameters:
        action - A field operation.
        symbol - A COAL symbol.
        stmt - A COAL sink.
        op - A field operation to be performed with the referenced COAL value.
        Returns:
        A field transformer that represents the influence of composing a COAL value with another.
